sentences.en: Adjust the aerial's position and direction for the best reception.
sentences.cn: 调整天线的位置和方向以达到最佳接收效果。

sentences.en: Adjust the lighting so it is soft and restful.
sentences.cn: 调节灯光使其看上去既柔和又能给人带来舒缓感。

sentences.en: Animals adjust themselves to their environment.
sentences.cn: 动物能适应自己生活的环境.

sentences.en: Check and adjust the brakes regularly.
sentences.cn: 经常检查并调节刹车装置。

sentences.en: Children are sensitive to disapproval and adjust their behaviour accordingly.
sentences.cn: 孩子们对批评十分敏感,并会相应地调整自己的行为.

sentences.en: Don't tie [ put on ] your shoes in a melon patch or adjust your hat under a plum tree -- avoid being suspected.
sentences.cn: 瓜田不纳 履,李下不整冠.

sentences.en: He climbed up to the roof to adjust the aerial for a better reception.
sentences.cn: 他爬上屋顶调整天线,以改善接收效果.

sentences.en: He has been forced to adjust his schedule.
sentences.cn: 他被迫调整了自己的日程安排。

sentences.en: He stopped to try to adjust his vision to the faint starlight.
sentences.cn: 他停下脚步试着让眼睛适应微弱的星光。

sentences.en: Human beings are infinitely flexible and able to adjust when survival depends on it.
sentences.cn: 人类的适应能力是无穷尽的,为了生存可以适应任何环境.

sentences.en: I squinted to adjust my eyes to the dimness.
sentences.cn: 我眯起眼，努力适应黑暗的环境。

sentences.en: If your employment status changes, your tax code will be adjusted accordingly.
sentences.cn: 如果就业状况改变，你的免税代码也会作相应调整。

sentences.en: It has been hard to adjust but now I'm getting satisfaction from my work.
sentences.cn: 适应虽然艰难，但是现在我已逐渐从工作中获得了满足。

sentences.en: Normally, when demand and supply are out of sync, you either increase the supply, or you adjust the price mechanism.
sentences.cn: 通常，当供需失衡时，要么加大供给，要么调整价格机制。

sentences.en: Pull the lever towards you to adjust the speed.
sentences.cn: 把操纵杆向你身体一侧拉动以调节速度。

sentences.en: Taste the soup and adjust the seasoning.
sentences.cn: 尝尝汤的味道，然后调整佐料用量。

sentences.en: The chair has a ratchet below it to adjust the height.
sentences.cn: 这把椅子下面有棘轮调整高度。

sentences.en: They’ll soon settle in – kids are very good at adjusting.
sentences.cn: 他们很快就会习惯的——小孩子适应能力很强。

sentences.en: Watch out for sharp bends and adjust your speed accordingly.
sentences.cn: 当心急转弯并相应调整车速。

words.tran_cn: [自] 调节器；调停者；（保险等）理算员

trans.tran_en: to change or move something slightly to improve it or make it more suitable for a particular purpose
to gradually become familiar with a new situation
